name: Spiky situatuion
description:
Little project which i made at 8AM, had to do smthn to not fall asleep.

USE LMB,  SPACE TO JUMP!

This game is a hyper-casual game, where you should dodge spikes and score as much points as possible! 

Good luck!

if you stumble upon some bugs, then tell me! I will try to fix them!
